{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} BMX {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # BMX BMX , an abbreviation for bicycle motocross or bike motocross , is a cycle sport performed on BMX bikes, either in competitive BMX racing or freestyle BMX, or else in general on- or off-road recreation. BMX began when young cyclists appropriated motocross tracks for recreational purposes and stunting, eventually evolving into specialized BMX bikes and competitions. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMX)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
